rooms.description: Scandinavian style living room with abundant natural light and open space
Integrated dining area adjacent to the kitchen for modern Scandinavian design
Modern Scandinavian kitchen with functional layout and integrated storage
Spacious master bedroom featuring an attached en-suite bathroom. Designed for privacy.
Secondary bedroom with Scandinavian minimalist style
Secondary bedroom for family or guest use

openings.description: Main entrance door with Scandinavian design elements.
Secondary exit leading to the rooftop terrace access.

additional_features.description: Rooftop terrace designed as an extension of the living space with a Scandinavian aesthetic, providing a relaxing outdoor area in accordance with local Vastu principles.
